words.source: H2029 (הָרָה, 'to conceive'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'conceived', ESV 'conceived', NASB 'conceived' — all agree
H802 (אִשָּׁה, 'woman/wife'), HTd/Ncfsa (article/noun-common-feminine-singular-absolute); KJV 'the woman', ESV 'The woman', NASB 'The woman'
H3205 (יָלַד, 'to bear/give birth'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'bare', ESV 'bore', NASB 'gave birth to' — all agree
H1121 (בֵּן, 'son'), HNcmsa (noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'a son'
H7200 (רָאָה, 'to see'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'she saw', ESV 'she saw', NASB 'she saw' — all agree
H3588 (כִּי, 'that/because'), HC (conjunction); KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that' — all agree
H2896 (טוֹב, 'good/beautiful'), HAamsa (adjective-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'goodly', ESV 'fine', NASB 'beautiful' — all convey 'beautiful/good'
H1931 (הוּא, 'he'), HPp3ms (pronoun-personal-3ms); KJV 'child', ESV 'child', NASB 'child' — functions as copula subject
H6845 (צָפַן, 'to hide/treasure up'), HC/Vqw3fs/Sp3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs/suffix-3ms); KJV 'she hid him', ESV 'she hid him', NASB 'she hid him' — all agree
